Web Service Endpoint# PATCH /v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/PATCH-v1-appEventLocalizations-_id_#url)



```
PATCH https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEventLocalizations/{id}
```
